column5: Anyone have any experience with any hotels in Vermillion Bay? Now needing some rooms Friday evening - found several on google but just looking to pick one that someone can vouch for. TIA.
Now it looks like Dryden. No luck in VB.
i've stayed at the northside motel in vbay on occassion they are clean rooms , nothing fancy but clean, their number is 807-227-5339
That was the first place i tried. All booked but found 3 in Dryden.thanks!!
Joek3, I Just sent you a PM.
